org.trianacode.taskgraph.service

Interface RunnableNodeInterface

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Node
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    ErrorNode, RunnableNode, RunnableParameterNode, TriggerNode

    public interface RunnableNodeInterface
extends Node
    An input/output NodeCable associated with a Task which can be Runnable.
